tool.name: HMGM Segmentation Correction
tool.description: Manual segmentation correction by a human

param.name: input_segmentation
param.label: Input Segmentation JSON file
param.help: JSON file for the Segmentation file to be corrected

param.name: context_json
param.label: Human MGM Task Context
param.help: JSON string containing context information needed for creating Human MGM task

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
This is a human MGM that facilitates manual segmentation correction by providing a human with a Structure Metadata editor. Note that, if the tool is run by a job submitted from AMPPD, the context parameter will be automatically generated by AMPPD; any user defined value will be overwritten.
